QuestData.Title: Competition Schmompetition
QuestData.Description: I'm just a little guy, trying to set up my own independent business. Working hard toward the Azerothian dream, ya know?$B$BWell soon as I set up shop, the Venture Co. next door decided they wanted me out. They've been harrassing me with threatening letters, using words like 'cease' and 'desist.' $B$BWorst of all, the schematics for my newest machine are missing, and I know those corporate pilferers stole them! Go to the Sludge Fen and knock out some of their employees. I know they're hiding my blueprints!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 6 of Sputtervalve's Blueprints from Venture Co. Drudgers, Mercenaries, or Peons.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can't believe they would stoop so low! Did you get my blueprints back?
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks for recovering my blueprints. Now my work on the Silver Bullet X-831 can continue.
